title: All Different Kinds Of People Look For Bigfoot
content: When you think of a bigfooter, you normally think of what, a man? Flannel shirt? Beard? Cargo pants? Well not this bigfooter. In fact all different kinds of people look for bigfoot from all walks of life. The bigfooter in this video certainly isn't what most people would consider the typical bigfoot researcher, but kudos to her for doing it anyways.
